translations: n.<古>赞美，称赞；颂歌；（lauds）（主要指罗马天主教教堂的）晨祷
n.（Laud）劳德（英国坎特伯雷大主教威廉·劳德 William Laud）

phrs.translation: 赞美, 称赞, 褒奖, 称道

sentences.sentence: So under Archbishop Laud, only the official liturgy could be recited in church.
sentences.translation: 因此在大主教劳德的淫威下，只有官方的礼拜时能够在教堂里被吟诵。

sentences.sentence: I will laud mine enemies and they will become friends; I will encourage my friends and they will become brothers.
sentences.translation: 我赞美敌人。敌人于是成为朋友；我鼓励朋友，朋友于是成为手足。
